high_descs: Turn around and go near the sofa.
Take the controller from the couch.
Turn around and go near the desklamp on the next room.
Put the desklamp near the controller and the lamp will be glow.
anns.task_desc: To glow the DeskLamp using the controller.

high_descs: take the desklamp to walk them.
anns.task_desc: to keep the Controller on the DeskLamp

high_descs: Go straight to the sofa near to the table.
Take the controller from the sofa
Turn right then turn left head towards the bedroom walk to the desklamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a controller by the light of a DeskLamp
